item.description:
Boston Live Music 1000 Member (unofficial) celebration.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=On14fd4TJkQ

Come one,come all.. This  is a special meetup.  'We hit 1000 Members!!!" Great place to have the Meetup and my band the Juke Joint Rhythm Rockers and DJ-E Bomb will be Rockin and Rollin the night away... bring your dancing shoes. (one of our members says his wife and him  may  go and will be willing to show people some rockin roll dance moves..) But we need people to say they are attending  to encourage them to go...Hey you can even dress up in your 50's 60's garb... Lets make this one of Boston Live Music best Meetups.. there is a whole bunch of you that want to make new friends so here is your chance.... lets' do this..

Listen to music, Meet new friends dance ,eat, drink and just have fun... And all you singles you may even meet the love of your life.. trying to do my job as the organizer, So let's rock...

http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Juke-Joint-Rhythm-Rockers/103918483054954?ref=tn_tnmn

We also need help with greeters... Send me a message if you want to be a greeter or would like to help in anyway..

$10.00 at the door..
item.name: 1000 Member Celebration!! Juke Joint Rhythm Rockers & DJ E-Bomb @ Hard Rock Cafe
